author: yeckang
body:
#### PR description:

* @bsunanda made a PR #46587 to add the new GE21 chambers which will be added for 2025 scenario
* During the validation of the geometry, the overlapped chambers are reported ([link](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1475107/#sc-202-3-release-validation))
* This PR resolving the issue and put the GE21 chamber on the correct position

@watson-ij @bsunanda
title: [GEM][Geometry] Resolving the issue of the overlapped chamber and add new GE21 chambers
